name: Kim's Christmas
description:
Christmas is the season to be jolly, that goes for everyone. You play as 'supreme leader' Kim; who has decided to switch places with Santa for just one day so that he can have the excitement Santa has every year.

The goal of the game is to simply throw gifts down the chimney of various homes. You must be careful because not every child has been good this year, hence giving naughty children a gift will reduce your points by 1.

What are you waiting for? Those kids need their presents so hurry up and start playing now!
